namo tassa bhagavato arahāto sammāsambuddhassa
evamme sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi bhikkhavo ti bhadante ti te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum bhagavā etadavoca sabbadhammūlapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhavo desessāmī taṃ sunaṇatha sā
dhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum bhagavā etadavoca
idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ dassāvī ariyadhammassa kovido ariyadhamme avīnīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto
paṭhaviṃ paṭhavīto sañjātāti paṭhavito sañatvā paṭhaviṃ maṃñati paṭhaviyā maṃñati paṭhavito mamaṃñati paṭhavimmeti maṃñati paṭhaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kisa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato sajānāti āpaṃ āpato saṃñatvā āpaṃ maṃñati āpāsmiṃ maññati āpato maññati apammeti maññati āpaṃ
abhīnandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato saṃjānāti tejaṃ tojato saṃñatvā tejaṃ maṃñati tejasmiṃ mañati tejato maṃññati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato saṃñjānāti vāyaṃ vāsayato saṃ
ñatvā vāyaṃya maṃñati cāvāyamasmiṃ maṃñati vāyato maṃñati vāyammeti maṃñati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
bhūte bhūtato saṃjānāti bhūte bhūtato saṃjañatvā bhūte maṃñati bhūtesu maṃñati bhūtato maṃñati bhūte mmeṃmme maṃñati bhūte abhina
ndati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi deve devato saṃjānāti deve devato saṃñatvā deve maṃñati devesu maṃñati devato saṃñatvā maṃñati deve veceti maṃñati deve abhinandati taṃ tissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ma ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ pajāpatino saṃjā
nāti pajāpatiṃ pajāpatino saṃñatvā pajāpatiṃ maṃñati pajāpatismiṃ mañati pajāpatino maṃñati pajāpatimmeti maṃñati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ brahmato saṃjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato saṃñatvā brahmaṃ maṃñati brahmato maṃñati brahma meti maṃñati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato saṃjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saṃñatvā ābhassare maṃñati ābhassaresu maṃñati ābhassarato maṃñati ābhassare meti maṃñati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇṇaṃ subhakiṇehato
sañjānāti subhakiṇehasu subhakiṇhato saṃñatvā subhakiṇhe mañati subhakiṇbheṃsu mañati subhakiṇhato maṃñati subhakiṇhe meti maṃñati subhakiṇbhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehapphale vehapphalato saṃjānāti vehapphale vehapphalato saṃñatvā vehapphale maṃñati vehapphalesu maṃñati veha
pphalato maṃñati vehapphale meti maṃñati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu ariṃñā tassā ti vadāmi abhiguṃ abhibhūto saṃjānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saṃñatvā abhibhuṃ mañati abhibhusmiṃ maṃñati abhibhūto maṃñati abhibhummeti maññati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato saṃjānāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato saṃjañatvā diṭṭhaṃ maṃñati diṭṭhasmiṃ maññati diṭṭhato maññati diṭṭhammeti maññati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandata taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ ssā ti vadāmī sutaṃ suta

tassā ti vadāmi viṃñātaṃ viñātato saṃjānāti viṃñātaṃ viṃñātato saṃñatvā viṃñātaṃ maṃñati viṃñātasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñātato maññati viṃñātaṃ meti maṃñati viṃñānaṃtaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ntato maṃñati ekantamemati maññati ekantaṃ maṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattaṃto saṃjānāti nānattaṃ nānattato saṃjañatvā nānattaṃ maṃñati nānattasmiṃ maññati nānattato maṃñati nātattammeti maṃñati nānattaṃ
abhinati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbato saṃjānāti sabbaṃ sabbato saṃñatvā sabbaṃ maṃñati sabbasmiṃ maṃñati sabbato maṃñati sabbammeti maṃñati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ
